title: Morgan Stanley Upgrades Apple to Buy with $200 Price Target
description: Morgan Stanley upgraded Apple Inc. from Hold to Buy, raising its price target to $200 from $175, citing strong iPhone demand and services growth.

title: Goldman Sachs Initiates Coverage on Tesla with Neutral Rating
description: Goldman Sachs initiated coverage of Tesla Inc. with a Neutral rating and $250 price target, noting execution risks balanced against growth potential.

title: Wells Fargo Downgrades Netflix on Valuation Concerns
description: Wells Fargo downgraded Netflix from Overweight to Equal Weight, lowering its price target to $450 from $550 due to valuation concerns.
